Projects that we need help of you.

Currently v1.0.3

This page were created to list our stage of development. Sometimes we work in new features and project but it not will show in our site. So we will list our issues, ideas and progress for this project. Our progress bar will help you to see the progress. If you have any ideas send for us, if you have ideas for projects in progress in this page you can create a pull request in our Github or send us an email, just stay in touch.
